title: liempium
author: liempium
content: My decentralised Dex and Lottery application is for sale.I sell the whole system and encodings. I can't advance it because I don't have an advertising budget..My Dapphttps://www.piumporium.com

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: wrong section, this belong to "digital goods" https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0is it an auction? fixed price sale? what the sale includes (e.g. token/site/social network etc)?Is it possible to have data on profits/volumes/turnover?escrow accepted?what you want realize?in short, it is always better to provide as much information as possible! because a potential buyer wants to know as much as possible and it is something boring ask question...
